chapter.title: Reference Implementation of Tinkar
chapter.para: This section shall include user documentation for a reference implementation of the Terminology Knowledge Base standard, referred to as KOMET ( insert hyperlink ), and how various terminologies, such as SNOMED, LOINC, RxNorm, and HL7 terminologies shall be reproducibly represented using the Terminology Knowledge Base standard.

section.title: Versioning in Tinkar

figure.title: Latest View with Active Status versus Latest View with Any Status

para.emphasis: Latest View with Active Status versus Latest View with Any Status

section.para: In this example, the definition marked as 1 represents the most recent and active version of the Concept Definition. Below the current definition is the change history where each of the previous versions of Concept Definitions are represented.
